testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: Then I select the question by name "Student Readiness"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: When I click the Share button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: Then the Share dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: Then verify the Terms of Service URL is "https://www.digitaled.com/cloud/terms.aspx"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud
